page.title: 01Rural Wales near Machynlleth
page.content: The villaage of Forge, 1.5 miles from Machyynlleth, is in NW corner of the block. There ae about 30 dwellings of which 9 aare holiday homes. The residents are a mixture of young families, middle aged and pensioners, 2 or 3 retired from England. There is one Chapel, still active, a visiting libbrary and a public telephone kiosk. T.V. reception is obtained from aerials mountedd 2 or 300 meters up on hillsides. most reply on a car for local journeys but some walk and others cycle. one can book seat on the Post Bus to accompany the postman on his rounds. The main commercial activities are cattle and sheep farming and forstryy. One small site caters for Touring caravans and campers, some farms do 'Bed and Breakfast7 and the river Dulas has trout and salmon for the
